GetOperations.Name: Get
GetOperations.Description: Gets an existing AzureFrontDoor domain with the specified domain name under the specified subscription, resource group and profile.

CreateOperations.Name: CreateOrUpdate
CreateOperations.Description: Creates a new domain within the specified profile.

UpdateOperations.Name: Update
UpdateOperations.Description: Updates an existing domain within a profile.

DeleteOperations.Name: Delete
DeleteOperations.Description: Deletes an existing AzureFrontDoor domain with the specified domain name under the specified subscription, resource group and profile.

OtherOperations.Name: RefreshValidationToken
OtherOperations.Description: Updates the domain validation token.

GetOperations.Name: Get
GetOperations.Description: Gets an existing AzureFrontDoor endpoint with the specified endpoint name under the specified subscription, resource group and profile.

CreateOperations.Name: CreateOrUpdate
CreateOperations.Description: Creates a new AzureFrontDoor endpoint with the specified endpoint name under the specified subscription, resource group and profile.

UpdateOperations.Name: Update
UpdateOperations.Description: Updates an existing AzureFrontDoor endpoint with the specified endpoint name under the specified subscription, resource group and profile. Only tags can be updated after creating an endpoint. To update origins, use the Update Origin operation. To update origin groups, use the Update Origin group operation. To update domains, use the Update Custom Domain operation.

DeleteOperations.Name: Delete
DeleteOperations.Description: Deletes an existing AzureFrontDoor endpoint with the specified endpoint name under the specified subscription, resource group and profile.

OtherOperations.Name: PurgeContent
OtherOperations.Description: Removes a content from AzureFrontDoor.

OtherOperations.Name: GetResourceUsages
OtherOperations.Description: Checks the quota and actual usage of the given AzureFrontDoor endpoint under the given CDN profile.

OtherOperations.Name: ValidateCustomDomain
OtherOperations.Description: Validates the custom domain mapping to ensure it maps to the correct CDN endpoint in DNS.This api isn't work for apex domain.

GetOperations.Name: Get
GetOperations.Description: Gets an existing origin group within a profile.

CreateOperations.Name: CreateOrUpdate
CreateOperations.Description: Creates a new origin group within the specified profile.

UpdateOperations.Name: Update
UpdateOperations.Description: Updates an existing origin group within a profile.

DeleteOperations.Name: Delete
DeleteOperations.Description: Deletes an existing origin group within a profile.

ListOperations.Name: GetAll
ListOperations.Description: Lists all of the existing origin groups within a profile.

OtherOperations.Name: GetResourceUsages
OtherOperations.Description: Checks the quota and actual usage of the given AzureFrontDoor origin group under the given CDN profile.

GetOperations.Name: Get
GetOperations.Description: Gets an existing origin within an origin group.

CreateOperations.Name: CreateOrUpdate
CreateOperations.Description: Creates a new origin within the specified origin group.

UpdateOperations.Name: Update
UpdateOperations.Description: Updates an existing origin within an origin group.

DeleteOperations.Name: Delete
DeleteOperations.Description: Deletes an existing origin within an origin group.

ListOperations.Name: GetAll
ListOperations.Description: Lists all of the existing origins within an origin group.

GetOperations.Name: Get
GetOperations.Description: Gets an existing route with the specified route name under the specified subscription, resource group, profile, and AzureFrontDoor endpoint.

CreateOperations.Name: CreateOrUpdate
CreateOperations.Description: Creates a new route with the specified route name under the specified subscription, resource group, profile, and AzureFrontDoor endpoint.

UpdateOperations.Name: Update
UpdateOperations.Description: Updates an existing route with the specified route name under the specified subscription, resource group, profile, and AzureFrontDoor endpoint.

DeleteOperations.Name: Delete
DeleteOperations.Description: Deletes an existing route with the specified route name under the specified subscription, resource group, profile, and AzureFrontDoor endpoint.

ListOperations.Name: GetAll
ListOperations.Description: Lists all of the existing origins within a profile.

GetOperations.Name: Get
GetOperations.Description: Gets an existing AzureFrontDoor rule set with the specified rule set name under the specified subscription, resource group and profile.

CreateOperations.Name: CreateOrUpdate
CreateOperations.Description: Creates a new rule set within the specified profile.

UpdateOperations.Name: Update
UpdateOperations.Description: Creates a new rule set within the specified profile.

DeleteOperations.Name: Delete
DeleteOperations.Description: Deletes an existing AzureFrontDoor rule set with the specified rule set name under the specified subscription, resource group and profile.

ListOperations.Name: GetAll
ListOperations.Description: Lists existing AzureFrontDoor rule sets within a profile.

OtherOperations.Name: GetResourceUsages
OtherOperations.Description: Checks the quota and actual usage of the given AzureFrontDoor rule set under the given CDN profile.

GetOperations.Name: Get
GetOperations.Description: Gets an existing delivery rule within a rule set.

CreateOperations.Name: CreateOrUpdate
CreateOperations.Description: Creates a new delivery rule within the specified rule set.

UpdateOperations.Name: Update
UpdateOperations.Description: Updates an existing delivery rule within a rule set.

DeleteOperations.Name: Delete
DeleteOperations.Description: Deletes an existing delivery rule within a rule set.

ListOperations.Name: GetAll
ListOperations.Description: Lists all of the existing delivery rules within a rule set.

GetOperations.Name: Get
GetOperations.Description: Gets an existing security policy within a profile.

CreateOperations.Name: CreateOrUpdate
CreateOperations.Description: Creates a new security policy within the specified profile.

UpdateOperations.Name: Update
UpdateOperations.Description: Updates an existing security policy within a profile.

DeleteOperations.Name: Delete
DeleteOperations.Description: Deletes an existing security policy within profile.

ListOperations.Name: GetAll
ListOperations.Description: Lists security policies associated with the profile

GetOperations.Name: Get
GetOperations.Description: Gets an existing Secret within a profile.

CreateOperations.Name: CreateOrUpdate
CreateOperations.Description: Creates a new Secret within the specified profile.

UpdateOperations.Name: Update
UpdateOperations.Description: Creates a new Secret within the specified profile.

DeleteOperations.Name: Delete
DeleteOperations.Description: Deletes an existing Secret within profile.

GetOperations.Name: Get
GetOperations.Description: Gets an Azure Front Door Standard or Azure Front Door Premium or CDN profile with the specified profile name under the specified subscription and resource group.

CreateOperations.Name: CreateOrUpdate
CreateOperations.Description: Creates a new Azure Front Door Standard or Azure Front Door Premium or CDN profile with a profile name under the specified subscription and resource group.

UpdateOperations.Name: Update
UpdateOperations.Description: Updates an existing Azure Front Door Standard or Azure Front Door Premium or CDN profile with the specified profile name under the specified subscription and resource group.

DeleteOperations.Name: Delete
DeleteOperations.Description: Deletes an existing  Azure Front Door Standard or Azure Front Door Premium or CDN profile with the specified parameters. Deleting a profile will result in the deletion of all of the sub-resources including endpoints, origins and custom domains.

ListOperations.Name: GetAll
ListOperations.Description: Lists all of the Azure Front Door Standard, Azure Front Door Premium, and CDN profiles within a resource group.

OperationsFromSubscriptionExtension.Name: GetProfiles
OperationsFromSubscriptionExtension.Description: Lists all of the Azure Front Door Standard, Azure Front Door Premium, and CDN profiles within an Azure subscription.

OtherOperations.Name: GetFrontDoorProfileResourceUsages
OtherOperations.Description: Checks the quota and actual usage of AzureFrontDoor endpoints under the given CDN profile.

OtherOperations.Name: CheckFrontDoorProfileHostNameAvailability
OtherOperations.Description: Check the name availability of a host name.

OtherOperations.Name: GetLogAnalyticsMetrics
OtherOperations.Description: Get log report for AFD profile

OtherOperations.Name: GetLogAnalyticsRankings
OtherOperations.Description: Get log analytics ranking report for AFD profile

OtherOperations.Name: GetLogAnalyticsLocations
OtherOperations.Description: Get all available location names for AFD log analytics report.

OtherOperations.Name: GetLogAnalyticsResources
OtherOperations.Description: Get all endpoints and custom domains available for AFD log report

OtherOperations.Name: GetWafLogAnalyticsMetrics
OtherOperations.Description: Get Waf related log analytics report for AFD profile.

OtherOperations.Name: GetWafLogAnalyticsRankings
OtherOperations.Description: Get WAF log analytics charts for AFD profile

OtherOperations.Name: GenerateSsoUri
OtherOperations.Description: Generates a dynamic SSO URI used to sign in to the CDN supplemental portal. Supplemental portal is used to configure advanced feature capabilities that are not yet available in the Azure portal, such as core reports in a standard profile; rules engine, advanced HTTP reports, and real-time stats and alerts in a premium profile. The SSO URI changes approximately every 10 minutes.

OtherOperations.Name: GetSupportedOptimizationTypes
OtherOperations.Description: Gets the supported optimization types for the current profile. A user can create an endpoint with an optimization type from the listed values.

OtherOperations.Name: GetResourceUsages
OtherOperations.Description: Checks the quota and actual usage of endpoints under the given Azure Front Door Standard or Azure Front Door Premium or CDN profile.

GetOperations.Name: Get
GetOperations.Description: Gets an existing CDN endpoint with the specified endpoint name under the specified subscription, resource group and profile.

CreateOperations.Name: CreateOrUpdate
CreateOperations.Description: Creates a new CDN endpoint with the specified endpoint name under the specified subscription, resource group and profile.

UpdateOperations.Name: Update
UpdateOperations.Description: Updates an existing CDN endpoint with the specified endpoint name under the specified subscription, resource group and profile. Only tags can be updated after creating an endpoint. To update origins, use the Update Origin operation. To update origin groups, use the Update Origin group operation. To update custom domains, use the Update Custom Domain operation.

DeleteOperations.Name: Delete
DeleteOperations.Description: Deletes an existing CDN endpoint with the specified endpoint name under the specified subscription, resource group and profile.

OtherOperations.Name: Start
OtherOperations.Description: Starts an existing CDN endpoint that is on a stopped state.

OtherOperations.Name: Stop
OtherOperations.Description: Stops an existing running CDN endpoint.

OtherOperations.Name: PurgeContent
OtherOperations.Description: Removes a content from CDN.

OtherOperations.Name: LoadContent
OtherOperations.Description: Pre-loads a content to CDN. Available for Verizon Profiles.

OtherOperations.Name: ValidateCustomDomain
OtherOperations.Description: Validates the custom domain mapping to ensure it maps to the correct CDN endpoint in DNS.

OtherOperations.Name: GetResourceUsages
OtherOperations.Description: Checks the quota and usage of geo filters and custom domains under the given endpoint.

GetOperations.Name: Get
GetOperations.Description: Gets an existing origin within an endpoint.

CreateOperations.Name: CreateOrUpdate
CreateOperations.Description: Creates a new origin within the specified endpoint.

UpdateOperations.Name: Update
UpdateOperations.Description: Updates an existing origin within an endpoint.

DeleteOperations.Name: Delete
DeleteOperations.Description: Deletes an existing origin within an endpoint.

ListOperations.Name: GetAll
ListOperations.Description: Lists all of the existing origins within an endpoint.

GetOperations.Name: Get
GetOperations.Description: Gets an existing origin group within an endpoint.

CreateOperations.Name: CreateOrUpdate
CreateOperations.Description: Creates a new origin group within the specified endpoint.

UpdateOperations.Name: Update
UpdateOperations.Description: Updates an existing origin group within an endpoint.

DeleteOperations.Name: Delete
DeleteOperations.Description: Deletes an existing origin group within an endpoint.

ListOperations.Name: GetAll
ListOperations.Description: Lists all of the existing origin groups within an endpoint.

GetOperations.Name: Get
GetOperations.Description: Gets an existing custom domain within an endpoint.

CreateOperations.Name: CreateOrUpdate
CreateOperations.Description: Creates a new custom domain within an endpoint.

UpdateOperations.Name: Update
UpdateOperations.Description: Creates a new custom domain within an endpoint.

DeleteOperations.Name: Delete
DeleteOperations.Description: Deletes an existing custom domain within an endpoint.

ListOperations.Name: GetAll
ListOperations.Description: Lists all of the existing custom domains within an endpoint.

OtherOperations.Name: DisableCustomHttps
OtherOperations.Description: Disable https delivery of the custom domain.

OtherOperations.Name: EnableCustomHttps
OtherOperations.Description: Enable https delivery of the custom domain.

GetOperations.Name: Get
GetOperations.Description: Retrieve protection policy with specified name within a resource group.

CreateOperations.Name: CreateOrUpdate
CreateOperations.Description: Create or update policy with specified rule set name within a resource group.

UpdateOperations.Name: Update
UpdateOperations.Description: Update an existing CdnWebApplicationFirewallPolicy with the specified policy name under the specified subscription and resource group

ListOperations.Name: GetAll
ListOperations.Description: Lists all of the protection policies within a resource group.
